      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        Evaluates a predictor. 
         Usage: mltk.predictor.evaluation.Evaluator
 -d     data set path
 -m     model path
 [-r]   attribute file path
 [-e]   AUC (a), Error (c), RMSE (r) (default: r)
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments.
